name: Leave No Trace!
description:
You are an inmate in a high security prison, and you must escape! You have exactly one explosive charge, and the ability to magically repair damage caused by explosives. Blow up walls to escape your cell and avoid security cameras, then put them back together so you can get your bomb back, and destroy the next one! The only way to escape is to Leave No Trace!

This was my contribution to Global Game Jam 2020 (https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/leave-no-trace-1). Hope you like it!
